title: Bitcoin approaches new yearly highs after erasing 20% dip
description:
Bitcoin touched the $49,000 on Feb. 12, reclaiming the price levels it hit after the historic approval of spot Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs) related to the flagship crypto at the start of January. The flagship crypto was trading at $49,725 as of press time, according to CryptoSlate data. Bitcoin surged as U.S. markets opened for trading, erasing […]

The post Bitcoin approaches new yearly highs after erasing 20% dip appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Paul Krugman Calls Out U.S. Conservative Fear-Mongering on Europe’s Economy
